name: bleaching and dyeing, yarn | bleaching and dyeing, yarn | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19599/documentation

This dataset represents the process of dyeing of 1 kg of cotton yarn. ;This activity is modelled as a service, so no inputs of yarn are considered. Electricity consumption and chemicals used (hydrogen peroxide, sodium hydroxide, dye chemicals water and electricity) are considered as inputs. The dyeing process consists of following sequence.;1. Pre-treatment- demineralisation of water, scouring and bleaching of fabric, drain, rinse drain, neutralisation with acid, Hot wash with peroxide killer, drain;2. Dyeing- treatment with levelling agent and salt, color dosing, dyeing, colour migration, cooling, level check,  soda dosing, dyeing run, sample check, if ok, drain;3. After treatment- rinse, neutralisation, drain, soap wash, drain, rinse, adding finishing chemical, drain;;The result of this activity is 1 kg dyed cotton yarn (medium shade).

The activity starts with loading the greige yarn into the dyeing machine for pre-treatment bleaching. However, this activity is modeled as a service, so no input of greige yarn is considered in the inputs from technosphere.

The activity end with drying and conditioning of yarn. Activity delivers the service of dyeing 1 kg yarn. It has to be used with 1 kg of yarn.
category: C:Manufacturing/13:Manufacture of textiles/131:Spinning, weaving and finishing of textiles/1313:Finishing of textiles

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Based on average annual data from Indian manufacturer located Ludhiana (Punjab) in North India.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Package dyeing technology is used. The following processes are used to dye cotton yarn: Pre treatment of yarn (Ready for Dyeing), Dyeing, hydro extraction, drying conditionng, and utilities. The process involves immersing yarn in dyebath and the bath circulates around the yarn. Bath is heated by electricity generated  steam. This is followed by water extraction, drying and conditioning.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Industry data. Spinning mill in Punjab, North India was chosen to provide data based on its technical representation of the current state of business and its willingness to participate.Industry data has been supplemented with some details from literature.
